articles.title: Hezbollah launches missiles and drones at northern Israel - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: At least 14 Israeli soldiers are wounded in an attack launched from Lebanon as regional tensions escalate.
articles.content: The Lebanese armed group Hezbollah has claimed responsibility for an attack on a military facility in northern Israel that wounded at least 14 soldiers, saying it was carried out in retaliation for I… [+2233 chars]
